dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Asa Butcher [mailto:asa@chameleonproject.net] 
Posted At: Thursday, September 07, 2006 12:12 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notification of Claimed Infringement
Subject: Notification of Claimed Infringement


7 Sept, 2006
Dear Andrea Almeida,

It has come to our notice that one of your customers has used the
domain: www.theovimagazine.com to host material to which he has no legal
right or jurisdiction. The site carries articles, illustrations, logos,
cartoons and other material that are all copyrighted and he has no
permission to use them. The origin of all of this material is from a
similarly named site: www.ovimagazine.com.

Your site requests the following six items:

1. Please find attached an electronic signature of the person
("Complaining Party") authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is claimed to be infringed.

2. The entire site is filled with copyrighted material and he has
changed the author names on all of Asa Butcher and Thanos Kalamidas' 
work to his own (Oliver H.), but the links still go to our names! Beware
of any confusion because he has also created a web domain that is almost
the same as our magazine. Here is a representative list of multiple
copyrighted works that have been infringed at www.theovimagazine.com -
it is nowhere near the full list:

Editorial thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/intro/editorials/thanoskalamidas/intro-16/

Paternity leave left asa butcher
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/horizones/asabutcher/left/

is homosexuality a disease?
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/horizones/asabutcher

Copycat politics thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/iformat/thanoskalamidas/copy
/

Never trust the perfe thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/iformat/thanoskalamidas/finl
and/

French copycats thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/iformat/thanoskalamidas/fren
ch/

The Baltic, Bob and a boat
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/ikritic/asabutcher/baltic/

Being Zidane thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/sports/thanoskalamidas/zidan
e/

Copy about cats asa butcher
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/fart/asabutcher/cats/

Copycat education models thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/horizones/thanoskalamidas/ed
ucation/

MTV Finland thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/ikritic/thanoskalamidas/mtv/

Cinematic copycat asa butcher
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/fart/asabutcher/cinematic/

Copycat politics thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/iformat/thanoskalamidas/copy
/

Never trust the perfe thanos kalamidas
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/ifo

This article:
Paranoid passengers asa butcher
http://theovimagazine.com/archives/issue-16/iformat/asabutcher/paranoid/

...was written by me and actually translated into Finnish three months
ago for a print publication in Finland. The editor can verify. In
addition, we have over forty contributors who will also vouch for us. We
have the original PDF files too, we have all the originals.


3. You ask for identification of the material that is claimed to be
infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be
removed or access to which is to be disabled. As I mentioned before, the
entire website has copyrighted material, including the photographs,
covers, cartoons and radio shows. The site owner has none of the
original artwork, which we do, and he does not have permission to use
the work of any of the contributors, which we do. You might want to look
at the archives and ask why he has no content, except the PDFs, from the
first issues, by the way, we do have everything including the photos.

4.

Administrative Contact:
Herrmann, Oliver oli089@gmx.de
Circ.del Robalo788 A7,
Frac Los Mangos, Col.Versalles
Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco 48310
Mexico
+52 322 224 6160

Domain servers in listed order:
NS1.WEXICO.COM
NS2.WEXICO.COM

http://who.godaddy.com/whois.aspx?domain=theovimagazine.com&prog_id=goda
ddy
shows that the same person operates the site via the wexico.com name.


5. We fully state, in good faith, that the use of the material on the 
site is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. The information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of

perjury, that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the 
exclusive rights that are infringed.

We have emailed Oliver Herrmann about the site, but he has ignored our 
mails and blocked our IP addresses from seeing anything that is going
on.

We await your immediate response before seeking further legal action,

Mr Asa Butcher
(Signature attached)
-- 
We cover every issue...every day
www.ovimagazine.com
